author: fern
msg: - got rid of AutoIndexer Thread creation and using an isDaemon java.util.Timer
- this is so that the server will actually turnoff..
- but because of the Timer thread is isDaemon, the system could shutdown
before all of the remaining tasks are complete... i believe
